page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF {WAYNE HAYWARD On Saturday June 1st it was my sister's birthday.We got up and gave her some presents.We then got dressed and went to eat some breakfast. At quarter past nine we went to Anne's house to help put the raft onto a truck,and then we went to find a good place to put it on the river bank(river Ythan). Anne and the rest of the crew went across the bridge to the toilets to get their costumes on.We had lunch on the raft finishing just in time for the race to begin.We started when a man came round and blew his hooter. Then we started to walk down the river bank.On the way we helped twice by pulling the raft.We came in 7th last,we won 2 prizes for the funniest and most creative raft.
